name: Puzzle Thing
description:
A puzzle game I made for a first year uni assessment, based on how coloured light interacts with coloured text.

Currently in development. Please ignore some weirdness with some of the models textures, they got corrupted and i'm currently in the process of fixing this. Also there is a heap of lighting bugs when its on itch.io, these are also being looked into.

How to play:

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Left mouse button to interact with things

Right mouse button to turn light on and off

E to change the light colour

Pick up the batteries to charge your light, there's one in each room

Complete a each puzzle to move onto the next, there are notes to help you.

If you are stuck on a room, find the mini me to unlock the next room.
